name: The Crossing (itch) (spwlz, scriptorious, Bryson C.)
description:
It's been 14 days since everything changed on nightfall of Halloween. Most of our friends and family are dead now, turned into these damn zombies. Had to grab what we could and go into the woods to escape the cities. Now we band together with whoever we meet because if you're alone you die. All we know is that we have to survive.

Controls

Movement: WASD
Shoot: LMB
Reload: R
Buy Ammo: Number key 1 (10 Gold)
Buy MediPack: Number key 2 (20 Gold)
Buy Turret: Number key 3 (50 Gold)
Summon an Ally Survivor: Number key 4 (60 Gold)
Pause: P

Credits

spwlz - Gameplay programming
scriptorious - UI, Sound design/implementation
Bryson - Music, sound design

Fonts

https://www.1001fonts.com/deadhead-rough-font.html
https://www.1001fonts.com/ghost-brush-font.html
